English: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ, by the commandment of God our Savior and the Lord Jesus Christ, our hope
Bahnar: Inh Pôl jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu Krist chih hơpong kơ Timôthê. Hmach kơ ih, dăm. Ih kon inh tơpă kơlih kơ ih lui kơ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist đơ̆ng inh bơtho ih sơ̆. Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei hăm Kon Sư Yêsu Krist athei inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Sư. 'Bok Kei-Dei dŏng pơklaih bơ̆n đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch. Bơ̆n lui kơ Yêsu Krist bơ̆n băt kơ Sư gô ăn kơ bơ̆n oei hơdai hăm Sư ning-mônh. Inh krao khan apinh 'Bă tơm bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei hăm Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist wei-lăng ih tôm tơdrong. Apinh Sư mơnat kơ ih, hăm ăn kơ ih hiôk-hian ling-lang.

English: To Timothy, a true son in the faith: Grace, mercy, and peace from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.
Bahnar: Inh Pôl jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu Krist chih hơpong kơ Timôthê. Hmach kơ ih, dăm. Ih kon inh tơpă kơlih kơ ih lui kơ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist đơ̆ng inh bơtho ih sơ̆. Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei hăm Kon Sư Yêsu Krist athei inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Sư. 'Bok Kei-Dei dŏng pơklaih bơ̆n đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch. Bơ̆n lui kơ Yêsu Krist bơ̆n băt kơ Sư gô ăn kơ bơ̆n oei hơdai hăm Sư ning-mônh. Inh krao khan apinh 'Bă tơm bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei hăm Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist wei-lăng ih tôm tơdrong. Apinh Sư mơnat kơ ih, hăm ăn kơ ih hiôk-hian ling-lang.

English: As I urged you when I went into Macedonia—remain in Ephesus that you may charge some that they teach no other doctrine
Bahnar: Inh wă kơ ih kư̆ oei tơ Pơlei Êphêsô, kư̆m thoi inh athei ih ki lăp inh wă năm đơ̆ng Pơlei Êphêsô tơ dêh char Masêđôn. Na inh athei ih oei tơ pơlei âu khŏm khŏm yua kơ đei lu bơngai tơ noh bơtho tơdrong ưh kơ trŏ tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei tơpă. Na ih athei khă lu sư 'nĕ pă bơtho thoi noh dơ̆ng.

English: nor give heed to fables and endless genealogies, which cause disputes rather than godly edification which is in faith.
Bahnar: Ih athei lu sư hŭt lê̆ tơdrong roi kư̆ kă gah adrĕch adrung yă 'bok so sơ̆. Kơlih kơ sư bơtho tơdrong 'noh na lu sư pơjah ling-lang. Lu tơdrong 'noh ưh kơ yua wă tơgŭm bơ̆n ôh. Bơ̆n chu lui kơ Sư mă tơpă na bơ̆n gơh jang tơdrong Sư.

English: Now the purpose of the commandment is love from a pure heart, from a good conscience, and from sincere faith
Bahnar: Inh athei ih khă lu sư thoi noh wă kơ lu sư đei đon 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, hăm lui mă trŏ, thoi noh na sư gơh 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei hăm bôl buăl tơ ala teh âu mơ̆n.

English: from which some, having strayed, have turned aside to idle talk
Bahnar: Đei bơngai mơ'nah hŭt lê̆ tơdrong lui sư na jing pă đei đon 'lơ̆ng tơpăt dơ̆ng, na jing hơwơ̆l kơ tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei. Lu sư bơtho kư̆ kă đĕch 'noh.

English: desiring to be teachers of the law, understanding neither what they say nor the things which they affirm.
Bahnar: Lu sư wă bơtho lu tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă sơ̆, mă-lei lu sư ưh kơ hlôh wă bơtho thoi yơ. Lu sư khan gơh bơtho tơpă, mă-lei lu sư ưh kơ hlôh wao kơdih sư.

English: But we know that the law is good if one uses it lawfully
Bahnar: Bơ̆n băt tơdrong juăt 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă sơ̆ 'lơ̆ng tơpăt tơpă na lu bơ̆n athei bơtho mă trŏ.

English: knowing this: that the law is not made for a righteous person, but for the lawless and insubordinate, for the ungodly and for sinners, for the unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă dôm lu tơdrong noh yua Sư wă phak lu bơngai kơnê̆ ưh kơ sĭ wă phak lu bơngai 'lơ̆ng ôh. Sư wă kơ phak lu bơngai ưh kơ chu, lu bơngai kư̆ kă, lu bơngai ưh kơ lui kơ Sư, lu bơngai pơm yoch, lu bơngai mă chă pơlôch đe, lu bơngai mă pơlôch mĕ 'bă kơdih

English: for fornicators, for sodomites, for kidnappers, for liars, for perjurers, and if there is any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine
Bahnar: lu bơngai ngôi pơyô kư̆ kă, lu bơngai tơduă drŏ-nglo tơngôi băl, lu bơngai chă rôp tĕch đe, lu bơngai chă hơlĕnh kơ đe, lu bơngai jâu pơlơ̆m kơ đe, hăm dôm lu bơngai hŭt lê̆ tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt.

English: according to the glorious gospel of the blessed God which was committed to my trust.
Bahnar: Tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt noh tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei. 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ inh bơtho tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng Sư. Sư boih mă hiôk-hian ling-lang. Sư Kră Yang tih hloh.

English: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord who has enabled me, because He counted me faithful, putting me into the ministry
Bahnar: Inh bơnê kơ Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist yua kơ Sư ăn kơ jơhngơ̆m inh pran kơtang jang tơdrong Sư. Păng inh bơnê kơ Sư tơchĕng đon Sư khan inh trŏ bơngai gơh jang tơdrong Sư, na Sư rơih iŏk inh jang kơ Sư hloi.

English: although I was formerly a blasphemer, a persecutor, and an insolent man; but I obtained mercy because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.
Bahnar: Mă inh pơma kơnê̆ kơ Sư sơ̆, inh pơjăm Sư păng pơm kơnê̆ kơ lu bơngai lui kơ Sư, mă-lei Sư rơih iŏk inh mơ̆n. 'Bok Kei-Dei mơnat kơ inh sơ̆ kơlih kơ inh tam mă lui kơ Kră Yang Yêsu, na inh ưh kơ tơtĭnh dôm tơdrong 'noh kơnê̆.

English: And the grace of our Lord was exceedingly abundant, with faith and love which are in Christ Jesus.
Bahnar: Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist 'mêm mơnat kơ inh tơpă ăn kơ inh lui kơ Sư păng ăn kơ inh 'mêm kơ Sư hăm đĭ-đăng bơngai. Sư kư̆m ăn kơ đĭ-đăng bơngai lui lei-lăi mơ̆n.

English: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptance, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners, of whom I am chief.
Bahnar: Tơdrong âu trŏ tơpă, bơ̆n gơh lui tơpă: Kră Yang Yêsu Krist jur oei tơ ala teh âu wă kơ pơklaih lu bơngai yoch. Inh boih bơngai mă pơm yoch lơ hloh kơ đĭ-đăng bơngai nai.

English: However, for this reason I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might show all longsuffering, as a pattern to those who are going to believe on Him for everlasting life.
Bahnar: Mă-lei 'Bok Kei-Dei oei mơnat kơ inh na pơklaih inh yua kơ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist wă tơbăt kơ kon bơngai Sư mơnat tơpă kơ inh mă pơm yoch lơ hloh kơ đĭ-đăng bơngai nai. Na lu bơngai nai gô 'bôh tơdrong Sư mơnat kơ inh, sư băt 'Bok Kei-Dei mơnat tơpă kơ đĭ-đăng bơngai, na lu sư gô lui kơ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist hăm arih ling-lang.

English: Now to the King eternal, immortal, invisible, to God who alone is wise, be honor and glory forever and ever. Amen.
Bahnar: Bĕ bơ̆n ư-ang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, Sư Pơtao bơ̆n mă arih ling-lang. Đei minh 'nu Sư đĕch. Sư Kră Yang ưh kơ đei layơ lôch. Bơ̆n ưh kơ gơh 'bôh Sư ôh. Bĕ bơ̆n ư-ang kơ Sư ling-lang ưh kơ đei layơ tôch. A-men.

English: This charge I commit to you, son Timothy, according to the prophecies previously made concerning you, that by them you may wage the good warfare
Bahnar: Ơ dăm Timôthê, ih pơm dôm tơdrong inh athei ih âu hŏ. Ih pơm kư̆m thoi lu bơngai khan lê̆ hơdrol pơkă gah ih sơ̆. Ih 'blŏk kơ tơdrong sư pơkă 'noh wă kơ ih nuih kơ tơblah hăm yang kơnê̆

English: having faith and a good conscience, which some having rejected, concerning the faith have suffered shipwreck
Bahnar: păng wă kơ ih lui kơjăp khŏm khŏm pơm đon 'lơ̆ng tơpăt kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei hăm đĭ-đăng bơngai. Đei lu bơngai mơ'nah hŭt lê̆ đon 'lơ̆ng sư kơdih na jing hŭt lê̆ tơdrong lui sư mơ̆n.

English: Therefore I exhort first of all that supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks be made for all men
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong inh wă pơkă kơ ih dang ei tơdrong âu kăl tơpă: Inh athei iĕm krao khan bơnê kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei ling-lang apinh Sư dŏng mơnat đĭ-đăng bơngai păng đĭ-đăng 'bok pơtao păng đĭ-đăng kră pơgơ̆r wă kơ bơ̆n oei hiôk-hian păng đei đon tơpăt kiơ̆ tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: for kings and all who are in authority, that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and reverence.
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong inh wă pơkă kơ ih dang ei tơdrong âu kăl tơpă: Inh athei iĕm krao khan bơnê kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei ling-lang apinh Sư dŏng mơnat đĭ-đăng bơngai păng đĭ-đăng 'bok pơtao păng đĭ-đăng kră pơgơ̆r wă kơ bơ̆n oei hiôk-hian păng đei đon tơpăt kiơ̆ tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Savior
Bahnar: Bơ̆n krao khan thoi noh 'lơ̆ng tơpă păng Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei lăp đon tơpă. Sư pơklaih bơ̆n đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch.

English: who desires all men to be saved and to come to the knowledge of the truth.
Bahnar: Păng Sư wă kơ đĭ-đăng bơngai gơh klaih đơ̆ng pơm yoch păng wă kơ lu sư băt tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei

English: For there is one God and one Mediator between God and men, the Man Christ Jesus
Bahnar: Đei minh 'nu Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei păng đei minh 'nu pơm 'long sơlam đĕch anhăk kon bơngai ala teh wă kơ bơngai ala teh hiôk hăm 'Bok Kei-Dei. Bơngai mă pơm 'long sơlam ei anăn Sư Yêsu Krist.

English: who gave Himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time
Bahnar: Sư ăn akâu Sư kơdih lôch tang wă huai iŏk đĭ-đăng kon bơngai. Truh boih sơnăm 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă Kon Sư lôch ei sơ̆, sơnăm 'noh boih Yêsu lôch tang huai iŏk kon bơngai, wă kon bơngai băt kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei pơklaih đĭ-đăng bơngai đơ̆ng yoch.

English: for which I was appointed a preacher and an apostle—I am speaking the truth in Christ and not lying—a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth.
Bahnar: Kơlih kơ thoi noh 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ inh pơm jơ̆ng 'bang Yêsu Krist wă bơtho tơdrong 'noh kơ đĭ-đăng teh đak, wă bơtho lu sư gah tơdrong lui kơ Yêsu Krist păng tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei. Inh ưh kơ hơlĕnh ôh, inh pơma tơpă kơ ih.

English: I desire therefore that the men pray everywhere, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting
Bahnar: Tơ rim anih akŭm tơduă iĕm, inh wă kơ lu drŏ-nglo krao khan kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, lu bơngai drŏ-nglo bu mă đei jơhngơ̆m 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ưh kơ hil kơ đe.

English: in like manner also, that the women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with propriety and moderation, not with braided hair or gold or pearls or costly clothing
Bahnar: Gah tơdrong hơbĕn ao lu bơngai drŏ-kăn, inh ưh kơ wă kơ sư hrŭk hơbĕn ao wă pơang akâu kơdih đĕch. Păng inh ưh kơ wă kơ sư pơm sŏk sư wă pơang kơ đe; păng ưh kơ wă kơ sư 'bot tơmam maih hơdah anam kăp. Inh ưh kơ wă kơ sư hrŭk ao rŏ kăp jên mơ̆n.

English: but, which is proper for women professing godliness, with good works.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu lui kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei sư ưh kơ gơh pơm thoi noh ôh. Sư athei đei đon 'mêm mơnat kơ đe păng asong đe tơmam.

English: Let a woman learn in silence with all submission.
Bahnar: Lăm lu iĕm akŭm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei, lu bơngai drŏ-kăn athei oei thĕng, mơ̆ng bơngai mă bơtho, lui yom kơ bơngai bu mă bơtho iĕm 'noh.

English: And I do not permit a woman to teach or to have authority over a man, but to be in silence.
Bahnar: Inh ưh kơ ăn lu bơngai drŏ-kăn bơtho tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei lăm iĕm akŭm. Păng inh ưh kơ ăn sư pơgơ̆r lu bơngai drŏ-nglo mơ̆n. Lu sư athei oei thĕng 'nĕ kơ pơma lăm iĕm akŭm.

English: For Adam was formed first, then Eve.
Bahnar: Kơlih kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei pơjing 'bok Ađam hơdrol, klaih kơ noh pơjing yă Ewơ.

English: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived, fell into transgression.
Bahnar: Păng ưh kơ sĭ 'bok Ađam lui kơ yang Satan ôh, yă Ewơ lui kơ yang Satan pơhlŭ, na sư pơm yoch hiong tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă.

English: This is a faithful saying: If a man desires the position of a bishop, he desires a good work.
Bahnar: Tơdrong đe bơtho âu sĭt tơpă: Tơdrong jang kră wei-lăng lu bơngai lui lăm hnam akŭm, tơdrong jang noh kăl tơpă. Bơngai bu 'maih jang tơdrong 'noh sư chă tơdrong jang 'lơ̆ng tơpă. Thoi noh bơ̆n athei rơih chă lu bơngai thoi âu wă wei-lăng bơngai lui: Bơngai bu đe ưh kơ lah layơ bâu roi sư, sư iŏk akăn minh 'nu đĕch, sư bơngai hơdrăl ling-lang păng ưh kơ pơm kư̆ kă. Sư bơngai dim, năr tơmoi truh sư tơkan sơng iŏk atŏk tơ hnam sư. Sư hơgei bơtho tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: A bishop then must be blameless, the husband of one wife, temperate, sober-minded, of good behavior, hospitable, able to teach
Bahnar: Tơdrong đe bơtho âu sĭt tơpă: Tơdrong jang kră wei-lăng lu bơngai lui lăm hnam akŭm, tơdrong jang noh kăl tơpă. Bơngai bu 'maih jang tơdrong 'noh sư chă tơdrong jang 'lơ̆ng tơpă. Thoi noh bơ̆n athei rơih chă lu bơngai thoi âu wă wei-lăng bơngai lui: Bơngai bu đe ưh kơ lah layơ bâu roi sư, sư iŏk akăn minh 'nu đĕch, sư bơngai hơdrăl ling-lang păng ưh kơ pơm kư̆ kă. Sư bơngai dim, năr tơmoi truh sư tơkan sơng iŏk atŏk tơ hnam sư. Sư hơgei bơtho tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: not given to wine, not violent, not greedy for money, but gentle, not quarrelsome, not covetous
Bahnar: Sư ưh kơ lah suai sik păng ưh kơ tôn teh đe. Sư bơngai dim khôn tơpă ưh kơ wă pơjah pơjăng păng đe. Sư ưh kơ hăt sa jên lơ ôh.

English: one who rules his own house well, having his children in submission with all reverence
Bahnar: Sư pơgơ̆r hnam dơnŏ sư gơh tơpă na hnam dơnŏ sư, kon akăn sư chu yom.

English: (for if a man does not know how to rule his own house, how will he take care of the church of God?)
Bahnar: Tơdah sư ưh kơ gơh pơgơ̆r hnam dơnŏ kon akăn sư, thoi yơ sư gơh wei-lăng kon 'Bok Kei-Dei lĕ?

English: not a novice, lest being puffed up with pride he fall into the same condemnation as the devil.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu 'nao lui sư ưh kơ gơh wei-lăng bơngai lui ôh, hli kơ sư pơang akâu kơdih, na 'Bok Kei-Dei phak sư kư̆m thoi phak yang Satan sơ̆ mơ̆n.

English: Moreover he must have a good testimony among those who are outside, lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil.
Bahnar: Dah sư pơm 'lơ̆ng hơdrol, mă bơngai lui, mă bơngai ưh kơ lui jô̆ sư bơngai 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ngăl. Dah sư bơngai ưh kơ tơpăt, sĭt đe bâu roi sư tơpă păng pă jor sư gô pơm thoi yang Satan wă.

English: Likewise deacons must be reverent, not double-tongued, not given to much wine, not greedy for money
Bahnar: Dah bơngai lui wă jang lăm hnam 'Bok Kei-Dei, sư athei pơm mă 'lơ̆ng tơpăt adrol 'mơ̆i, ưh kơ et sik suai, ưh kơ hăt sa jên lơ păng trŏ tơdrong sư jang sư 'nĕ kơ pơgŏ iŏk jên đe.

English: holding the mystery of the faith with a pure conscience.
Bahnar: Sư athei lui kiơ̆ tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei mă tơpă.

English: But let these also first be tested; then let them serve as deacons, being found blameless.
Bahnar: Iĕm athei pơlong lăng sư 'mơ̆i. Dah sư jang 'lơ̆ng na iĕm ăn kơ sư jang ling-lang.

English: Likewise, their wives must be reverent, not slanderers, temperate, faithful in all things.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai drŏ-kăn wă jang lăm hnam 'Bok Kei-Dei, sư kư̆m athei pơm mă 'lơ̆ng tơpăt mơ̆n; 'nĕ kơ pơma plĕch kơ đe, 'nĕ kơ et sik suai. Sư athei pơm tôm tơdrong 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ngăl.

English: Let deacons be the husbands of one wife, ruling their children and their own houses well.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai drŏ-nglo lei-lăi mơ̆n dah sư wă jang lăm hnam 'Bok Kei-Dei. Sư athei iŏk akăn minh đĕch păng athei pơgơ̆r hnam dơnŏ sư mă 'lơ̆ng.

English: For those who have served well as deacons obtain for themselves a good standing and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai jang 'lơ̆ng lăm hnam 'Bok Kei-Dei, sư lui kơjăp tơpă kơ Kră Yang Yêsu Krist ưh kơ hli kơ đe păng đe gô ngơnh kơ sư hơgei.

English: These things I write to you, though I hope to come to you shortly
Bahnar: Inh chih kơ ih kơthơ âu, mă-lei ưh kơ đunh mơ̆n inh wă năm ngôi tơ ih.

English: but if I am delayed, I write so that you may know how you ought to conduct yourself in the house of God, which is the church of the living God, the pillar and ground of the truth.
Bahnar: Dah inh ưh kơ yĕng năm, inh chih kơthơ âu boih wă kơ ih băt bơ̆n 'nhŏng oh bơngai lui wă pơm thoi yơ lăm hnam 'Bok Kei-Dei. Bơ̆n bơngai lui jing kon Kră Yang 'Bok Kei-Dei. Sư boih arih ling-lang ưh kơ đei layơ lôch, na lu bơ̆n bơngai lui mă răk tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei kơjăp, trŏ kơ bơ̆n bơtho tơdrong Sư kơ đe nai dơ̆ng.

English: Now the Spirit expressly says that in latter times some will depart from the faith, giving heed to deceiving spirits and doctrines of demons
Bahnar: Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng khan tơpăt wă kơ bơ̆n băt nhên: Ning-mônh gô đei lu bơngai achăng lê̆ tơdrong lui sư, lu sư wă lui yom kơ lu yang mă pơma hơlĕnh kơ kon bơngai, lu sư gô lui kơ yang kơnê̆ bơtho.

English: speaking lies in hypocrisy, having their own conscience seared with a hot iron
Bahnar: Lu yang kơnê̆ wơh lu bơngai hơlĕnh chă bơtho tơdrong sư. Đon lu bơngai ei ưh pă tơchĕng đon 'lơ̆ng dơ̆ng boih.

English: forbidding to marry, and commanding to abstain from foods which God created to be received with thanksgiving by those who believe and know the truth.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai ei chă bơtho đe khan ưh kơ gơh iŏk klo kăn păng kơ̆m kơ lu tơmam sa. Mă-lei 'Bok Kei-Dei pơjing tơmam sa 'noh wă kơ bơ̆n gơh sa. Na lu bơ̆n bơngai lui băt tôm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei, bơ̆n athei krao khan bơnê kơ Sư 'mơ̆i, klaih kơ noh bơ̆n gơh sa boih.

English: For every creature of God is good, and nothing is to be refused if it is received with thanksgiving
Bahnar: Tôm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei pơjing 'lơ̆ng ngăl, bơ̆n gơh sa đĭ-đăng, mă-lei bơ̆n athei krao khan bơnê kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei 'mơ̆i.

English: for it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer.
Bahnar: Kiơ̆ kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei pơkă tơmam sa bơ̆n 'lơ̆ng ngăl yua kơ bơ̆n krao khan bơnê kơ Sư hơdrol boih.

English: If you instruct the brethren in these things, you will be a good minister of Jesus Christ, nourished in the words of faith and of the good doctrine which you have carefully followed.
Bahnar: Dah ih bơtho lu bơngai lui tơdrong Yêsu Krist kiơ̆ thoi inh pơkă, lei đe băt kơ tơdrong jang ih âu 'lơ̆ng dêh păng đe băt kơ ih lui kơjăp tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei khŏm khŏm kư̆m thoi ih lui đơ̆ng blŭng sơ̆ khơ̆ dang ei.

English: But reject profane and old wives’ fables, and exercise yourself toward godliness.
Bahnar: Ih 'nĕ mơ̆ng tơdrong đe roi hơ'mon kư̆ kă. Đe roi tơdrong 'noh ưh kơ đei lĕch kiơ. Pơhrăm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei đĕch kăl hloh.

English: For bodily exercise profits a little, but godliness is profitable for all things, having promise of the life that now is and of that which is to come.
Bahnar: Bơ̆n pơhrăm pơtơ̆p wă kơ jơhngơ̆m pran kư̆m kăl yua ră mơ̆n, mă-lei ưh kơ dang tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei. Bơ̆n pơhrăm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei kăl yua tơpă kơ bơ̆n. Bơ̆n pơhrăm tơdrong Sư bơ̆n arih hiôk dang ei păng gô arih hiôk ling-lang ning-mônh.

English: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptance.
Bahnar: Tơdrong inh bơtho ih âu trŏ tơpă na ih gơh lui.

English: For to this end we both labor and suffer reproach, because we trust in the living God, who is the Savior of all men, especially of those who believe.
Bahnar: Thoi noh na bơ̆n athei adrin tơpă jang tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei yua kơ bơ̆n băt tơpă boih Sư arih ling-lang păng dŏng pơklaih đĭ-đăng bơngai đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch, dôm lu bơngai lui kơ Sư.

English: These things command and teach.
Bahnar: Lu tơdrong mă inh bơtho ih âu mă hei, ih athei bơtho păng ată kơ lu bôl lui dơ̆ng hŏ.

English: Let no one despise your youth, but be an example to the believers in word, in conduct, in love, in spirit, in faith, in purity.
Bahnar: Ih 'nĕ ăn kơ đe pơjăm ih khan ih oei moh đĕch ưh kơ gơh bơtho đe. Lăm ih wă pơma dah ih wă jang ih athei pơm 'lơ̆ng tơpăt wă kơ lu bôl buăl bơngai lui 'bôh ih na lu sư pơm kiơ̆ thoi ih. Ih athei 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei păng 'mêm kơ bôl buăl. Ih athei lui mă kơjăp păng pơm jơhngơ̆m mă 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, wă kơ lu bơngai lui gơh lui kiơ̆ thoi ih mơ̆n.

English: Till I come, give attention to reading, to exhortation, to doctrine.
Bahnar: Inh wă kơ ih pơm thoi âu khŏm khŏm tơ̆p mă inh truh tơ ih tơ âu: Lăm iĕm akŭm dih băl ih kư̆ kơ đŏk sơ̆p hla bơar 'Bok Kei-Dei, ih kư̆ kơ bơtho tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei đĕch.

English: Do not neglect the gift that is in you, which was given to you by prophecy with the laying on of the hands of the eldership.
Bahnar: Sơ̆ lăp lu kră pel kơ̆l ih na 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ lu bơngai khan lê̆ hơdrol gah ih, 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ ih jang tơdrong Sư pran hơgei. Na ih athei gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei tơgŭm ih ling-lang tơdrong ih hơgei 'noh.

English: Meditate on these things; give yourself entirely to them, that your progress may be evident to all.
Bahnar: Ih athei pơm kiơ̆ kơ dôm tơdrong inh pơkă kơ ih âu. Ih athei adrin tơpă thoi noh na wă kơ đĭ-đăng bôl lăng ih rai đunh rai kơjăp gah tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: Take heed to yourself and to the doctrine. Continue in them, for in doing this you will save both yourself and those who hear you.
Bahnar: Ih athei kơchăng gah akâu ih kơdih păng gah tơdrong ih bơtho mơ̆n. Ih kư̆ kơ adrin pơm khŏm khŏm kiơ̆ thoi inh pơkă na ih gô klaih đơ̆ng tơdrong yoch păng lu bơngai mơ̆ng ih kư̆m klaih mơ̆n.

English: Do not rebuke an older man, but exhort him as a father, younger men as brothers
Bahnar: Ih khă lu bơngai kră mă 'lơ̆ng, ih athei pơma lung sư yua kơ sư kră hloh kơ ih; păng ih lăng sư thoi lĕ kơ 'bă ih. Ih lăng lu bơngai drŏ-nglo 'lơ̆p kơ ih kư̆m thoi oh ih mơ̆n.

English: older women as mothers, younger women as sisters, with all purity.
Bahnar: Ih lăng lu yă kră thoi mĕ ih păng ih lăng lu drŏ-kăn 'lơ̆p kơ ih kư̆m thoi oh ih mơ̆n, ih athei pơma dơnuh păng sư mă 'lơ̆ng đĕch.

English: Honor widows who are really widows.
Bahnar: Păng ih athei tơgŭm lu drŏ-kăn adro mă ưh kơ đei bu 'me sa sư.

English: But if any widow has children or grandchildren, let them first learn to show piety at home and to repay their parents; for this is good and acceptable before God.
Bahnar: Mă-lei lu bơngai drŏ-kăn adro đei kon dah sâu sư, noh lê̆ lu kon sâu lu sư 'noh 'me sa sư. 'Bok Kei-Dei wă kơ bơ̆n wei-lăng 'me sa mĕ 'bă, yă 'bok bơ̆n kơdih. Bơ̆n athei 'me plơ̆ sư dơ̆ng.

English: Now she who is really a widow, and left alone, trusts in God and continues in supplications and prayers night and day.
Bahnar: Bơngai adro tơpă ưh kơ đei bu wă 'me sư na sư lui kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei gô tơgŭm sư. Sư krao khan kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei ling-lang apinh Sư tơgŭm.

English: But she who lives in pleasure is dead while she lives.
Bahnar: Dah đei drŏ-kăn adro pơm đi chă mơdro akâu sư kơ lu bơngai drŏ-nglo, mă sư oei arih ră mă-lei lăng sư dang lĕ kơ lôch đĕch 'noh.

English: And these things command, that they may be blameless.
Bahnar: Ih khan kơ lu bơngai mă oei mĕ dah yă adro po, ih athei lu sư wei-lăng 'me sa kơdih wă kơ đe huay kơ pơjĭp pơjăm bâu roi. Dah bơngai lui bơ̆n bu mă ưh kơ wă tơdŏng mơnat kơ mĕ 'bă, yă 'bok, 'nhŏng oh, kon akăn sư, đe lăng dang lĕ ưh kơ lui boih. Đe lăng sư kơnê̆ hloh kơ lu bơngai tam mă lui dơ̆ng.

English: But if anyone does not provide for his own, and especially for those of his household, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.
Bahnar: Ih khan kơ lu bơngai mă oei mĕ dah yă adro po, ih athei lu sư wei-lăng 'me sa kơdih wă kơ đe huay kơ pơjĭp pơjăm bâu roi. Dah bơngai lui bơ̆n bu mă ưh kơ wă tơdŏng mơnat kơ mĕ 'bă, yă 'bok, 'nhŏng oh, kon akăn sư, đe lăng dang lĕ ưh kơ lui boih. Đe lăng sư kơnê̆ hloh kơ lu bơngai tam mă lui dơ̆ng.

English: Do not let a widow under sixty years old be taken into the number, and not unless she has been the wife of one man
Bahnar: Ih 'nĕ chih tơmơ̆t anăn lu drŏ-kăn adro lăm sơ̆p hla bơar dah sư tam mă truh tơdrâu-jĭt sơnăm. Ih chih anăn lu bơngai drŏ-kăn adro mă đei minh 'nu klo đĕch sơ̆ păng đe jô̆ kơ sư bơngai 'lơ̆ng, pơtih gia sư rong kon sư gơh găt, sư gơh sơng iŏk bơngai tơmoi truh tơ hnam sư, sư ôp rơgoh jơ̆ng bơngai lui, sư tơgŭm lu bơngai đei tơdrong gleh pơmat-tat, sư gơh tơgŭm đe ling-lang tơpă.

English: well reported for good works: if she has brought up children, if she has lodged strangers, if she has washed the saints’ feet, if she has relieved the afflicted, if she has diligently followed every good work.
Bahnar: Ih 'nĕ chih tơmơ̆t anăn lu drŏ-kăn adro lăm sơ̆p hla bơar dah sư tam mă truh tơdrâu-jĭt sơnăm. Ih chih anăn lu bơngai drŏ-kăn adro mă đei minh 'nu klo đĕch sơ̆ păng đe jô̆ kơ sư bơngai 'lơ̆ng, pơtih gia sư rong kon sư gơh găt, sư gơh sơng iŏk bơngai tơmoi truh tơ hnam sư, sư ôp rơgoh jơ̆ng bơngai lui, sư tơgŭm lu bơngai đei tơdrong gleh pơmat-tat, sư gơh tơgŭm đe ling-lang tơpă.

English: But refuse the younger widows; for when they have begun to grow wanton against Christ, they desire to marry
Bahnar: Ih 'nĕ chih anăn lu bơngai adro mă sư oei moh hli kơ sư oei wă iŏk klo dơ̆ng na hŭt lê̆ tơdrong jang Yêsu Krist

English: having condemnation because they have cast off their first faith.
Bahnar: na lu sư jing yoch yua kơ lu sư ưh kơ pơm kiơ̆ thoi sư pơkă kơ Yêsu hơdrol.

English: And besides they learn to be idle, wandering about from house to house, and not only idle but also gossips and busybodies, saying things which they ought not.
Bahnar: Lu sư nơ̆k nơ̆k tu, nơ̆k nơ̆k bơbah ling-lang nŏng kơ chă ngôi hnam âu hnam to ưh kơ wă jang păng chă pơma plĕch kơ đe, pơma tơdrong ưh kơ trŏ kơ nơ̆r pơma.

English: Therefore I desire that the younger widows marry, bear children, manage the house, give no opportunity to the adversary to speak reproachfully.
Bahnar: Yua kơ thoi noh na inh wă kơ bơngai drŏ-kăn adro oei moh iŏk klo na sư tơpŭ kon wei-lăng hnam dơnŏ sư kơdih wă kơ đe mă ưh kơ lui huay pă che bơle kơ bơ̆n dơ̆ng.

English: For some have already turned aside after Satan.
Bahnar: Đei bơngai adro mơ'nah achăng lê̆ tơdrong lui sư na jing kiơ̆ yang Satan.

English: If any believing man or woman has widows, let them relieve them, and do not let the church be burdened, that it may relieve those who are really widows.
Bahnar: Bơngai lui bơ̆n mă drŏ-nglo, mă drŏ-kăn, bu mă đei bơngai adro lăm kơtum sư, sư athei 'me kơdih ưh kơ gơh ăn kơ bơngai lui 'me ôh. Bơngai lui 'me pôm lu bơngai adro mă ưh kơ đei bơngai tơgŭm 'me sư 'noh đĕch. Thoi noh na jên iĕm mah 'biơ̆.

English: Let the elders who rule well be counted worthy of double honor, especially those who labor in the word and doctrine.
Bahnar: Lu kră wei-lăng bơngai lui bơngai bu jang 'lơ̆ng iĕm thim 'biơ̆ jên khei sư, mă loi lu bơngai bơtho tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei.

English: For the Scripture says, “You shall not muzzle an ox while it treads out the grain,” and, “The laborer is worthy of his wages.”
Bahnar: Ih athei pơm thoi noh yua kơ sơ̆p hla bơar 'Bok Kei-Dei khan thoi âu; mă mônh: “Iĕm 'nĕ kơ trôp 'bơ̆r rơmo kơplah sư oei jang juă hơnong 'ba.” Mă 'bar: “Bơngai jang athei đei sa apah.” Thoi noh na bơngai bơtho lei-lăi mơ̆n, iĕm athei apah jên kiơ̆ kơ sư jang.

English: Do not receive an accusation against an elder except from two or three witnesses.
Bahnar: Dah đe jâu kơnê̆ kơ kră wei-lăng bơngai lui, ih 'nĕ kơ mơ̆ng sư hŏ, dah minh 'nu bơngai đĕch jâu sư. Dah lu sư 'bar pêng 'nu wă pơma thoi noh tơpă, 'noh ih gơh mơ̆ng păng jet hloi lu sư khan: “Tơdrong kiơ iĕm jâu sư?”

English: Those who are sinning rebuke in the presence of all, that the rest also may fear.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu pơm yoch tơpă ih athei pơma khă sư 'bơ̆t anăp đe tơpôl lu bơngai lui wă kơ lu bơngai lui kơchăng đon ưh kơ wă pơm yoch thoi bơngai 'noh dơ̆ng.

English: I charge you before God and the Lord Jesus Christ and the elect angels that you observe these things without prejudice, doing nothing with partiality.
Bahnar: Kră Yang bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei, Yŏng bơ̆n Yêsu Krist păng linh jang 'lơ̆ng Sư 'bôh bơ̆n ling-lang na ih athei kơchăng pơm kiơ̆ dôm tơdrong inh pơkă kơ ih 'noh. Inh wă kơ ih lăng đĭ-đăng bơngai lei-lăi đĕch, ih 'nĕ kơ lăng minh 'nu bơngai hloh kơ đe nai.

English: Do not lay hands on anyone hastily, nor share in other people’s sins; keep yourself pure.
Bahnar: Ih 'nĕ kơ hăt hot pel kơ̆l krao khan kơ đe wă ăn kơ đe wei-lăng bơngai lui. Ih athei gô pơlong lăng sư đunh 'mơ̆i. Dah ih hơloh pel kơ̆l krao khan kơ sư, na sư ưh tam tơchĕng đon hơdrol noh, hli kơ sư pơm yoch ning-mônh, dang lĕ ih athei sư pơm yoch. Ih athei pơm 'lơ̆ng tơpăt ling-lang.

English: No longer drink only water, but use a little wine for your stomach’s sake and your frequent infirmities.
Bahnar: Krô hmă ih jĭ klak, ih 'nĕ pă nhă đak 'blăng ngăl hŏ, ih athei et 'biơ̆ sik hơmu tŏ sĕt wă kơ huay pă jĭ dơ̆ng.

English: Let as many bondservants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honor, so that the name of God and His doctrine may not be blasphemed.
Bahnar: Đĭ-đăng lu bơngai lui, lu mơ'nah đĭch đe, sư athei lui yom kơ yŏng tơ'ngla sư wă kơ lu bơngai tam mă lui 'bôh sư pơm 'lơ̆ng kơ yŏng tơ'ngla sư na sư huay kơ pơjăm 'Bok Kei-Dei păng huay kơ pơjăm nơ̆r bơ̆n bơtho tơdrong 'nao 'lơ̆ng.

English: And those who have believing masters, let them not despise them because they are brethren, but rather serve them because those who are benefited are believers and beloved. Teach and exhort these things.
Bahnar: Đei bơngai đĭch păng yŏng, bre sư jing 'nhŏng oh yua kơ bre sư lui kơ Kră Yang boih, na bơngai đĭch ei athei lui yom kơ yŏng sư, sư jang kơ yŏng sư 'lơ̆ng hloh kơ sư tam mă lui sơ̆. 'Noh yua kơ sư đei đon 'mêm tơpă kơ yŏng sư, yua kơ yŏng sư bôl bơngai lui. Ih athei bơtho kơ đe dôm tơdrong inh ată wă kơ đe pơm kiơ̆.

English: If anyone teaches otherwise and does not consent to wholesome words, even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ, and to the doctrine which accords with godliness
Bahnar: Bơngai bu bơtho chroih tơ nai ưh kơ 'blep trŏ thoi Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist bơtho, tơdrong sĭt tơpă na bơ̆n lui âu, bơngai 'noh sư chă pơang akâu kơdih sư đĕch. Sư kơkal 'bơ̆r rơkah, sư ưh kơ pơwao akâu kơdih wă pơma thoi yơ. Sư 'maih chă pơjah pơjăng đĕch, sư chă pơma kơ bôl buăl sư, sư pơjah pơjăng dih băl păng che bơle, tơgar nơ̆r pơma, bu kư̆m wă kơ jei bu. Păng sư chă đăk đon kơdih khan đe wă pơm kơnê̆ kơ sư.

English: he is proud, knowing nothing, but is obsessed with disputes and arguments over words, from which come envy, strife, reviling, evil suspicions
Bahnar: Bơngai bu bơtho chroih tơ nai ưh kơ 'blep trŏ thoi Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist bơtho, tơdrong sĭt tơpă na bơ̆n lui âu, bơngai 'noh sư chă pơang akâu kơdih sư đĕch. Sư kơkal 'bơ̆r rơkah, sư ưh kơ pơwao akâu kơdih wă pơma thoi yơ. Sư 'maih chă pơjah pơjăng đĕch, sư chă pơma kơ bôl buăl sư, sư pơjah pơjăng dih băl păng che bơle, tơgar nơ̆r pơma, bu kư̆m wă kơ jei bu. Păng sư chă đăk đon kơdih khan đe wă pơm kơnê̆ kơ sư.

English: useless wranglings of men of corrupt minds and destitute of the truth, who suppose that godliness is a means of gain. From such withdraw yourself.
Bahnar: Đon lu sư jing ưh pă 'lơ̆ng boih, na lu sư pơjah pơjăng ling-lang. Lu sư ưh kơ hlôh tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei. Lu sư ưh kơ lui mă-lei lu sư pơma dih băl khan: “Bơ̆n pơm thoi bơngai lui, đơ̆ng noh na bơ̆n chă bơtho pơgŏ đe na gơh mơdrŏng.”

English: Now godliness with contentment is great gain.
Bahnar: Dah bơ̆n lui tơpă hăm đĭ jơhngơ̆m, noh kư̆m dang bơ̆n mơdrŏng mơ̆n yua kơ jơhngơ̆m bơ̆n hiôk 'lơ̆ng păng Sư boih.

English: For we brought nothing into this world, and it is certain we can carry nothing out.
Bahnar: Kơplah lăm mĕ bơ̆n tơpŭ kơ bơ̆n oei nge sơ̆, bơ̆n ưh kơ đei chĕp tơmam kiơ tơlĕch tơ teh âu. 'Noh thoi lĕ bơ̆n lôch ning-mônh, bơ̆n ưh kơ gơh chĕp ba tơmam kiơ ôh.

English: And having food and clothing, with these we shall be content.
Bahnar: Kơplah bơ̆n oei arih, đei tơmam sa păng hơbĕn ao hrŭk, dôm noh đĕch 'lơ̆ng boih.

English: But those who desire to be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and into many foolish and harmful lusts which drown men in destruction and perdition.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai wă chă mơdrŏng, yang Satan gô pơhlŭ sư, na sư 'maih chă tơdrong âu, tơdrong to, tơdrong kư̆ kă, tơdrong ưh kơ 'lơ̆ng kơ sư, na sư gô đei răm 'Bok Kei-Dei phak.

English: For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evil, for which some have strayed from the faith in their greediness, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows.
Bahnar: Bơngai bu hăt kơ chă jên, sư gô pơm tôm tơdrong kơnê̆. Đei bơngai lu mơ'nah hăt kơ chă jên ling-lang na sư jing achăng tơdrong lui sư păng sư đei lơ tơdrong ơh sơ'ngon.

English: But you, O man of God, flee these things and pursue righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, gentleness.
Bahnar: Ơ Timôthê, ih bơngai kiơ̆ 'Bok Kei-Dei, ih athei weh ataih đơ̆ng tơdrong kơnê̆ 'noh, ih adrin pơm đon 'lơ̆ng tơpăt, lui mă kơjăp, 'mêm kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei păng pơm jơhngơ̆m dim 'mêm kơ bôl buăl mơ̆n. Đei tơdrong gleh truh tơ ih ră, mă-lei ih athei adrin pơm kiơ̆ 'Bok Kei-Dei khŏm khŏm.

English: Fight the good fight of faith, lay hold on eternal life, to which you were also called and have confessed the good confession in the presence of many witnesses.
Bahnar: Pơtih gia lu bơngai kơdâu pơjei, bơngai bu mă kơdâu adrin tơpă jei sư, bơngai 'noh sư gô đei apah. Mă ih kư̆m lei-lăi athei adrin mă tơpă, lui mă kơjăp na jei ih, na ih gô đei iŏk tơdrong arih tơ plĕnh ling-lang. Hơtai ih lui tơm hmơm sơ̆, đe krao khan kơ ih đang boih, na ih pơma 'bơ̆t anăp đe tơpôl lơ khan ih wă tơpă lui kơ Yêsu Krist. Đơ̆ng noh sơ̆ boih 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ ih arih ling-lang.

English: I urge you in the sight of God who gives life to all things, and before Christ Jesus who witnessed the good confession before Pontius Pilate
Bahnar: Đĭ-đăng khŭl arih tơ ala teh đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn arih ngăl. Yêsu Krist pơma 'lơ̆ng tơpăt 'bơ̆t anăp 'bok pơtao Pilat. Na ih oei 'bơ̆t anăp 'Bok Kei-Dei păng Yŏng bơ̆n Yêsu Krist, ih athei kơchăng pơm kiơ̆ dôm tơdrong Sư pơkă kơ bơ̆n. 'Nĕ ăn đe tơplih tơdrong Sư pơkă kơ bơ̆n 'noh. Ih athei wei ling-lang tơ̆p truh năr Yŏng bơ̆n Yêsu Krist jur ning-mônh.

English: that you keep this commandment without spot, blameless until our Lord Jesus Christ’s appearing
Bahnar: Đĭ-đăng khŭl arih tơ ala teh đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn arih ngăl. Yêsu Krist pơma 'lơ̆ng tơpăt 'bơ̆t anăp 'bok pơtao Pilat. Na ih oei 'bơ̆t anăp 'Bok Kei-Dei păng Yŏng bơ̆n Yêsu Krist, ih athei kơchăng pơm kiơ̆ dôm tơdrong Sư pơkă kơ bơ̆n. 'Nĕ ăn đe tơplih tơdrong Sư pơkă kơ bơ̆n 'noh. Ih athei wei ling-lang tơ̆p truh năr Yŏng bơ̆n Yêsu Krist jur ning-mônh.

English: which He will manifest in His own time, He who is the blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings and Lord of lords
Bahnar: Trŏ năr 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn Kon Sư Yêsu Krist jur tơ ala teh âu ning-mônh. 'Bok Kei-Dei boih hiôk-hian tơpă, pôm Sư boih pơgơ̆r tôm tơdrong. Sư pơm 'Bok Pơtao Sư tih hloh kơ đĭ-đăng lu pơtao nai, Sư pơm Yŏng Sư tih hloh kơ đĭ-đăng lu yŏng nai.

English: who alone has immortality, dwelling in unapproachable light, whom no man has seen or can see, to whom be honor and everlasting power. Amen.
Bahnar: Sư ưh kơ layơ lôch. Sư oei tơ anih rang mơnhal, ưh kơ đei bu gơh năm jê̆ Sư. Đơ̆ng sơ̆ khơ̆ ning-mônh kon bơngai ala teh ưh kơ đei bu 'bôh Sư. Na bĕ bơ̆n pơư pơang 'Bok Kei-Dei mă pơgơ̆r ling-lang. A-men.

English: Command those who are rich in this present age not to be haughty, nor to trust in uncertain riches but in the living God, who gives us richly all things to enjoy.
Bahnar: Ih khan kơ lu bơngai mơdrŏng 'nĕ pơang akâu kơdih păng khan kơ sư 'nĕ gơnang kơ mŭk măk sư mơdrŏng. Athei sư tơchĕng gơnang kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei đĕch gơh tơgŭm sư. Tơdrong mơdrŏng ưh kơ kơjăp nhoi ôh. 'Bok Kei-Dei hơlăng, Sư ăn kơ bơ̆n tôm tơdrong bơ̆n kăl yua wă kơ bơ̆n chơt hiôk.

English: Let them do good, that they be rich in good works, ready to give, willing to share
Bahnar: Ih khan kơ lu bơngai mơdrŏng athei pơm jơhngơ̆m 'lơ̆ng păng đe păng athei gơh tơgŭm mơnat kơ lu bơngai dơnuh hin tơmam.

English: storing up for themselves a good foundation for the time to come, that they may lay hold on eternal life.
Bahnar: Dah sư hơlăng kơ đe thoi noh, mŭk măk sư huach 'biơ̆ mơ̆n, mă-lei sư mơdrŏng tôm tơdrong nơ̆r pơma đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei tơgŭm sư ling-lang păng sư gô iŏk tơdrong arih ning-mônh.
